meter_reading.notes: Meter orientation check: BADGER METER text at top, digital display readable left-to-right. White digits (5 digits on left): 0 2 2 7 1 = 2271 m³. Black digit (single digit on right, separated): 4 = 0.4 m³. Red dial analysis: Dial orientation: '0' mark at top of dial, '5' mark at bottom of dial. Dial number scale position: pointing at approximately 4.7 (between 4.5 and 5, closer to 5). Clock position: between 5 and 6 o'clock, closer to 6. Degrees: 170° (pointing DOWN, slightly right of bottom). Verification: Hand is pointing DOWN-RIGHT ✓. Dial reading: 170/3600 = 0.047 m³. Total: 2271 + 0.4 + 0.047 = 2271.447 m³
